description.english: Become one of the best shooters on the planet.
Become the most skilled engineer on the planet.
Become the most feared melee fighter in the tournament.
Become an expert at delivering first aid.
Become extremely proficient with alien technology.
Become an expert on alien biology.
Possess a strength greater than any creature on Earth.
Possess a strength greater than any creature of legend.
Have agility greater than an Olympic gymnast's.
Have agility greater than any creature on Earth.
Possess far greater endurance than any other human.
Have the ability to take large amounts of damage.
Possess an intelligence able to design alien-level equipment.
Possess the ability to design and operate advanced alien-level equipment.
Develop a will more powerful than any creature on Earth.
Find more about the Lanista's background.
Find love under the night sky.
Become the leader of a criminal clan.
Make the streets of SeoDong safer.
Take over a Mag'zhar army base.
Turn a colleague into a vampire.
Train a colleague to keep her from getting killed.
Find somebody to help a colleague in need of medical aid.
